boundaries.name: archive
boundaries.summary: Historical snapshots and large reference datasets (Read-Only)

boundaries.name: repo_docs
boundaries.summary: The 'Map' – Design specs, user guides, and theory docs

boundaries.name: repo_theory
boundaries.summary: The 'Source of Truth' – Core schemas, dimensions, and model definitions

boundaries.name: repo_tool
boundaries.summary: The 'Engine' – Collider logic, analysis pipeline, and AI tools

boundaries.name: viz_core
boundaries.summary: Visualization core (control bar, data manager, template)

boundaries.name: pipeline
boundaries.summary: Main analysis pipeline (driver, graph builder, extractors)

boundaries.name: classifiers
boundaries.summary: All classifier logic (identifying atoms and roles)

boundaries.name: body
boundaries.summary: [EXCEEDS LIMIT] Full src - use 'pipeline' or 'classifiers' instead

boundaries.name: complete
boundaries.summary: [DANGEROUS] Entire repo (excluding archive) - will exceed any context window

boundaries.name: research_atoms
boundaries.summary: Atom definitions for coverage analysis (explicit, no noise)

boundaries.name: agent_kernel
boundaries.summary: Agent boot protocol and manifest (~30k tokens)

boundaries.name: agent_tasks
boundaries.summary: Active tasks, sprints, and registry (~50k tokens)

boundaries.name: agent_intelligence
boundaries.summary: BARE truths, drift reports, metrics (~40k tokens)

boundaries.name: agent_full
boundaries.summary: Complete .agent/ context for task/planning queries (~150k tokens)

boundaries.name: aci_core
boundaries.summary: ACI module source code - the curriculum compiler

boundaries.name: aci_audit
boundaries.summary: Full ACI audit context - code + config + siblings + docs
